mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_items(order_id, product_id, unit_price, quantity, subtotal, created_at) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{unitPrice}, #{quantity}, #{subtotal}, #{createdAt});
mapper.select: SELECT oi.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, SUM(oi.quantity) AS totalQuantity, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS totalRevenue FROM order_items oi LEFT JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id GROUP BY oi.product_id, p.name ORDER BY totalQuantity DESC LIMIT #{limit}
